text: The men's shot put event at the 2004 World Junior Championships in Athletics was held in Grosseto, Italy, at Stadio Olimpico Carlo Zecchini on 13 July. A 6 kg (junior implement) shot was used. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; " width="35%" |- |bgcolor="gold"|Gold|| Georgi Ivanov ' |- |bgcolor="silver"|Silver|| Jakub Giża '
